prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes drums, bass, but without vocals.
captions:
Style 1:
No vocals, but with drums and bass, this song is complete.

Style 2:
This song is composed of drums and bass, but without any vocals.

Style 3:
Vocals are absent, but drums and bass are present in this song.
